sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>- Check if all the Models are of same language 
- Check if all the models are part of a group.</description>
        <name>Check NLU Model Migration is Complete</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var tables = NLUConstants.tables;
    var sysProps = NLUConstants.SYS_PROPS;
    var primaryField = NLUImportUtil.FIELDS_DATA[tables.SYS_NLU_MODEL].primaryField;

    var allSameLanguage = true;
    var foundUngroupedModel = false;

    var modelLang = null;
    var modelGr = new GlideRecord(tables.SYS_NLU_MODEL);
    modelGr.query();
    while (modelGr.next()) {
        var language = NLUModel.getLanguage(modelGr);
        if (!modelLang) modelLang = language;
        if (modelLang !== language) allSameLanguage = false;

        if (!modelGr.getValue(primaryField)) {
            var otherModelGr = new GlideRecord(tables.SYS_NLU_MODEL);
            if (!otherModelGr.get(primaryField, modelGr.getUniqueValue())) {
                gs.info('Found an ungrouped model: ' + modelGr.getUniqueValue());
                foundUngroupedModel = true;
                break;
            }
        }
    }

    if (!allSameLanguage && foundUngroupedModel) {
        gs.info('NLU Model migration is complete!');
        gs.setProperty(sysProps.MIGRATION_COMPLETED, 'true');
    }

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-03 03:54:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>32c45f130726201028ef0a701ad300e4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Check NLU Model Migration is Complete</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">04dd388b6d2220100acb70b35343302f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_32c45f130726201028ef0a701ad300e4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-07 16:09:17</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Check NLU Model Migration is Complete
